title: Unboxing: Bose SoundTouch 30 Series III Wireless Music System
description:
Bose SoundTouch 30 Series III Wireless Music System - www.abt.com

As a music enthusiast you're streaming new songs and favorite artists all the time. And the SoundTouch 30 wireless music system lets you hear them like never before. It connects directly to your home Wi-Fi network so there’s no complicated equipment to worry about. And it uses exclusive waveguide technology engineered around a high-performance woofer to produce deep rich sound that can fill even your largest rooms. So start streaming your favorite music instantly without a phone or tablet. Simply press one of six presets on the speaker or remote and the music starts.
